Receriver: Receiving Frequency: 2.4G....Video Output: 75O / 1Vp-p....Audio Output: 10KO / 200m Vp-p....Signal Output: Four channel audio & video signal....Power Consumption: 2W....Working Temperature: -10 ~ 50....Dimension: 8 x 2 x 10.5 cm / 3.15" x 0.79" x 4.13" (L x W x H) ....Color: White
Camera: Signal System: PAL NTSC....Effective Pixels: 628 (H) x 582 (V) 510 (H) x 492 (V)....Imaging Device: 1/3" Omn Vision CMOS....Horizontal Resolution: 380TV Line....Angle / Lens: 45° (f = 6mm)....Minimum Illumination: 3.0Lux (F1.2)....Scanning Frequency (H): 15.625KHz 15.734KHz....Scanning Frequency (V): 50Hz 60Hz....Power Adapter: DC 8V / 500mA....Dimension: 3.2 x 3.4 x 5.5 cm / 1.26" x 1.34" x 2.17" (L x W x H)....Color: Black
Digital display ... High receiver sensitivity .... Reliable performance ... Suitable for wireless monitoring project ...Miniature camera, easy to install
2 camera switch monitoring ... 2 channel receiver can be switched ... Open and effective wireless transmission distance of 100 meters ... Audio monitoring with microphone inside
Package Includes: 1 x Receiver...1 x AV cable (Cable Length: 122cm)...2 x Camera accessories...2 x Camera...3 x Charger...1 x Users manual
